plugins.name: fyrsmithlabs
plugins.description: Claude Code plugins for fyrsmithlabs project standards, workflows, development practices, and contextd cross-session memory. Includes YAGNI/KISS enforcement, git-repo-standards, git-workflows with multi-agent consensus review, Terminal Elegance design system compliance checking, and contextd integration for semantic search, memory, checkpoints, and error remediation.
